mil7.4.4:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vāyussa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.4:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vimuttivarakusumapupphitārammaṇavanantare ramitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.4:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.4:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu dharaṇīruhapādapagaṇe mathayati;
mil7.4.4:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vanantaragatena saṅkhāre vicinantena kilesā mathayitabbā.
mil7.4.4:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.4:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu ākāse carati;
mil7.4.4:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lokuttaradhammesu mānasaṃ sañcārayitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.4:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.4:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu gandhaṃ anubhavati;
mil7.4.4:4.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena attano sīlavarasurabhigandho anubhavitabbo.
mil7.4.4:4.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.4:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu nirālayo aniketavāsī;
mil7.4.4:5.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nirālayamaniketamasanthavena sabbattha vimuttena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.4:5.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
